sentences.en: Advancing technology and affluence make it easier to modify living conditions and the management of resource.
sentences.cn: 由于科学技术不断发展,人们日益富裕,使得生活条件和资源的管理更加容易调节.

sentences.en: All sorts of theories were put forward to account for his apparent affluence.
sentences.cn: 大家用各种各样的理由来解释他手头宽裕的原因.

sentences.en: For nearly fifty years we carried them to new levels of comfort, security, dignity, even affluence.
sentences.cn: 将近50年,我们带领他们实现更高水平的舒适 、 安全 、 尊严 、 甚至富裕.

sentences.en: For them, affluence was bought at the price of less freedom in their work environment.
sentences.cn: 对他们来说，富足是以减少在工作场所的自由为代价才获得的。

sentences.en: He could not fail to notice the signs of affluence and luxury on every hand.
sentences.cn: 他不能不注意到来自各方面的富裕和奢侈的种种迹象.

sentences.en: He quickly rose to affluence , ie became wealthy.
In her animal spirits there was an affluence of life.
sentences.cn: 在她那旺盛的精神中,有着丰富的生命力.

sentences.en: Lived in Illinois, Missouri, Colorado and Idaho, experiencing poverty and affluence.
sentences.cn: 居住地:(国)利诺斯州 、 苏里州 、 罗拉多州和爱达荷州, 体验贫穷与富足.(国人一辈子平均要搬6次家,这对丰富阅历很有帮助.

sentences.en: New research suggests that their grip on affluence is precarious.
sentences.cn: 最新的调查报告显示他们的经济和财富地位越来越不稳固.

sentences.en: Pockets of affluence coexist with poverty.
sentences.cn: 少数富裕地区与贫困地区并存。

sentences.en: The family depended on his ability to wangle a few dollars occasionally . With this money, they would eat well and dress well for a while , making a pretence of affluence.
sentences.cn: 一家人全靠他在外面讹个钱,诈个财, 吃点好的,穿点好的, 装门面.

sentences.en: The postwar era was one of new affluence for the working class.
sentences.cn: 战后是工人阶级富裕起来的全新时期。

sentences.en: Their affluence is more apparent than real.
sentences.cn: 他们的富有是虚有其表.

sentences.en: There is a lot of affluence in this part of the state because it has many businesses.
sentences.cn: 这个州的这一部分相当富有,因为它有很多商行.

sentences.en: Zurich's affluence came initially from cornering a sizeable chunk of the 14th Century silk trade.
sentences.cn: 苏黎世的富足最初来自于14世纪对丝绸贸易的高度垄断。

trans.tran_en: Affluence is the state of having a lot of money or a high standard of living
